details.description: Book your theory test from £31 using this official theory test booking service - you'll need your provisional licence number and an email address to book online
details.alternative_title: Book your official Driving Standards Agency (DSA) theory test
details.more_information:
You’ll need your:

  • Great Britain or Northern Ireland provisional driving licence number
  • email address to get your booking confirmation - you can’t book online if you don’t have one

You have to wait at least 3 clear working days before taking your test again if you don’t pass.

Data protection

You can read the Data Protection Act 1998 fair processing notice for the Driving Standards Agency (DSA) before you start.
details.introduction: Book your official driving theory test - you’ll need your provisional driving licence.
details.alternate_methods:
Book by phone

You can book your theory test by calling DSA. Your confirmation will be sent in the post if you don’t have an email address.

DSA theory test bookings

Telephone: 0300 200 1122
Welsh language: 0300 200 1133
Textphone: 0300 200 1166
Monday to Friday, 8am to 4pm

Book by post

To book your theory test by post download the application form and send it with your payment to DSA.

You can pay by cheque or postal order - make your cheque or postal order payable to the ‘Driving Standards Agency’. You can’t pay by cash.

Download ‘Postal application for a driving theory test’ form (PDF, 356KB)
